com.alpineclient.plugin.api.objects

Class AlpinePlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alpineclient.plugin.api.objects.AlpinePlayer

  • public final class AlpinePlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds data about an Alpine Client user and provides methods for interacting with them.
    Since:
    1.0.0

      • sendCooldown

        public void sendCooldown(@NotNull
                         @NotNull Cooldown cooldown)
        Sends a cooldown to this player.

        If you intend to utilize the Cooldowns module, you must first declare the capability with AlpineClientApi.registerCapabilities(Plugin, Capability...).

        Parameters:
        cooldown - the cooldown to send
        Since:
        1.3.0
